modules.name: Node.HTTP
modules.comments: This module defines low-level bindings to the Node HTTP module.

declarations.comments: The type of a HTTP server object
declarations.title: Server

declarations.comments: The effect associated with using the HTTP module.
declarations.title: HTTP

declarations.comments: Create a HTTP server, given a function to be executed when a request is received.
declarations.title: createServer

declarations.comments: Listen on a port in order to start accepting HTTP requests. The specified callback will be run when setup is complete.
declarations.title: listen

declarations.comments: Options to be supplied to `listen`. See the [Node API](https://nodejs.org/dist/latest-v6.x/docs/api/http.html#http_server_listen_handle_callback) for detailed information about these.
declarations.title: ListenOptions

declarations.comments: Listen on a unix socket. The specified callback will be run when setup is complete.
declarations.title: listenSocket

declarations.comments: Get the request headers as a hash
declarations.title: requestHeaders

declarations.comments: Get the request method (GET, POST, etc.)
declarations.title: requestMethod

declarations.comments: Coerce the request object into a readable stream.
declarations.title: requestAsStream

declarations.comments: Set a header with a single value.
declarations.title: setHeader

declarations.comments: Set a header with multiple values.
declarations.title: setHeaders

declarations.comments: Coerce the response object into a writable stream.
declarations.title: responseAsStream

modules.name: Node.HTTP.Client
modules.comments: This module defines low-level bindings to the Node HTTP client.

declarations.comments: The type of HTTP request options
declarations.title: RequestOptions

declarations.comments: The HTTP request method: GET, POST, etc.
declarations.title: method

declarations.comments: The request path, including query string if appropriate.
declarations.title: path

declarations.comments:
IP address family to use when resolving `hostname`.
Valid values are `IPV6` and `IPV4`
declarations.title: family

declarations.comments: Make a HTTP request using the specified options and response callback.
declarations.title: request

declarations.comments: Make a HTTP request from a URI string and response callback.
declarations.title: requestFromURI

declarations.comments: Create a writable stream from a request object.
declarations.title: requestAsStream

declarations.comments: Create a readable stream from a response object.
declarations.title: responseAsStream

declarations.comments: Set the socket timeout for a `Request`
declarations.title: setTimeout

declarations.comments:
Get the response headers as a hash
Cookies are not included and could be retrieved with responseCookies
declarations.title: responseHeaders

declarations.comments: Get the response cookies as Just (Array String) or Nothing if no cookies
declarations.title: responseCookies

modules.name: Node.HTTP.Secure
modules.comments: This module defines low-level bindings to the Node HTTPS module.

declarations.comments: The type of HTTPS server options
declarations.title: SSLOptions

declarations.comments:
The npnProtocols option can be a String, a Buffer, a Uint8Array, or an
array of any of those types.
declarations.title: NPNProtocols

declarations.comments:
The alpnProtocols option can be a String, a Buffer, a Uint8Array, or an
array of any of those types.
declarations.title: ALPNProtocols

declarations.comments: The PFX option can take either a String or a Buffer
declarations.title: PFX

declarations.comments:
The key option can be a String, a Buffer, an array of strings, or an array
of buffers.
declarations.title: Key

declarations.comments:
The cert option can be a String, a Buffer, an array of strings, or an array
of buffers.
declarations.title: Cert

declarations.comments:
The CA option can be a String, a Buffer, an array of strings, or an array
of buffers.
declarations.title: CA

declarations.comments:
The CRL option can be a String, a Buffer, an array of strings, or an array
of buffers.
declarations.title: CRL

declarations.comments: The DHParam option can take either a String or a Buffer
declarations.title: DHParam

declarations.comments:
Create an HTTPS server, given the SSL options and a function to be executed
when a request is received.
declarations.title: createServer
